title: Ocean Front Cliff Top Land near Weligama
details:
Weligama Cliffside is a 73 perch (1,825 sqm) piece of land perched high above sea level, looking out over the Indian Ocean. As such the property benefits from beautiful sunsets.

We will include with the sale, plans for a 550 sqm villa that has been designed by internationally recognised architects. We have all the necessary drawings for BOQ. This is an exclusive extra for anyone wishing to buy into a unique property in Sri Lanka.

We have both planning approval and CCD (Coastal Conservation Department) approval.
If you are looking for a stunning piece of beach front land, well positioned on the South Coast with sunset views, contemporary villa design and with planning approval, which will set you months ahead in terms of both time and cost, then this should be your first choice.
